name: Rust and Cargo (rustup)
description: Installs Rust, Cargo, and development tools via rustup with flexible toolchain management for Arch Linux

additionalTargets.description: Comma-separated list of additional compilation targets (e.g., 'wasm32-unknown-unknown,x86_64-pc-windows-gnu')

rustupProfile.description: Rustup installation profile (minimal = faster installation without docs/sources, default = complete toolchain)

globalCrates.description: Comma-separated list of crates to install globally via cargo install
